scripts.prepublishOnly: nx build npm-app && bun run clean-package.js
scripts.start-js: nx build npm-app && bun run with-env -- sh -c 'TS_NODE_BASEURL=./dist node -r tsconfig-paths/register dist/index.js ..'
scripts.start: nx build npm-app > /dev/null && bun run with-env -- sh -c 'TS_NODE_PROJECT=./tsconfig.json ts-node -r tsconfig-paths/register src/index.ts ..'
scripts.start-max: nx build npm-app > /dev/null && bun run with-env -- sh -c 'TS_NODE_PROJECT=./tsconfig.json ts-node -r tsconfig-paths/register src/index.ts .. --max'
scripts.start-lite: nx build npm-app > /dev/null && bun run with-env -- sh -c 'TS_NODE_PROJECT=./tsconfig.json ts-node -r tsconfig-paths/register src/index.ts .. --lite'
scripts.start-ask: nx build npm-app > /dev/null && bun run with-env -- sh -c 'TS_NODE_PROJECT=./tsconfig.json ts-node -r tsconfig-paths/register src/index.ts .. --ask'
scripts.start-superagent: nx build npm-app > /dev/null && bun run with-env -- sh -c 'TS_NODE_PROJECT=./tsconfig.json ts-node -r tsconfig-paths/register src/index.ts .. --superagent'
scripts.start-dir: bun run with-env -- ts-node -r tsconfig-paths/register src/index.ts
scripts.start-experimental: nx build npm-app > /dev/null && bun run with-env -- sh -c 'TS_NODE_PROJECT=./tsconfig.json ts-node -r tsconfig-paths/register src/index.ts .. --experimental'
scripts.start-manifold: bun run with-env -- ts-node -r tsconfig-paths/register src/index.ts ../../manifold
scripts.start-litestar: bun run with-env -- ts-node -r tsconfig-paths/register src/index.ts ../test/__mock-projects__/litestar
scripts.start-jpcsp: bun run with-env -- ts-node -r tsconfig-paths/register src/index.ts ../test/__mock-projects__/jpcsp
scripts.start-vscode: bun run with-env -- ts-node -r tsconfig-paths/register src/index.ts ../test/__mock-projects__/vscode
scripts.start-nushell: bun run with-env -- ts-node -r tsconfig-paths/register src/index.ts ../test/__mock-projects__/nushell
scripts.start-prod: bun run with-env -- ts-node -r tsconfig-paths/register src/index.ts
